scripts.deploy-eth-testnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network ethTestnet --reset
scripts.deploy-eth-mainnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network ethMainnet --reset
scripts.deploy-tether-testnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network tetherTestnet --reset
scripts.deploy-tether-mainnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network tetherMainnet --reset
scripts.deploy-moc-testnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network mocTestnet --reset
scripts.deploy-moc-mainnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network mocMainnet --reset
scripts.deploy-rdoc-testnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network rdocTestnet --reset
scripts.deploy-rdoc-mainnet: rm zos.dev-*.json; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network rdocMainnet --reset
